channel.title: Umm noob question but im new to this so pls help me
channel.description: ok i get testsscape for the source of my server and when i use mopar it lets me in fine but i cant figure out how to make myself admin so if someone could help me or tell me the code that makes a character admin pls.[br][size=1]Posted on: June 18, 2007, 08:13:50 AM[/size][hr]someone pls help me

item.title: Umm noob question but im new to this so pls help me
item.dc:creator: @jensie jensie
item.description:
@jensie wrote:

Open up client.java
search (ctrl+f) for start of moderator
You should see :

[code] //start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“mod jens”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}

else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“mod laurens”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}

else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("mod kilian "))
{
playerRights = 2;
}[/code]
and so on
Now change the name (“mod jens” for the first admin) into you ingame name.
1= moderator 2= admin 3= owner

Read full topic
item.source: Umm noob question but im new to this so pls help me
